Package xdi2.core.security.signature.validate

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AESSignatureValidator
    This is a SignatureValidator that can validate an XDI AESSignature.
    RSASignatureValidator
    This is a SignatureValidator that can validate an XDI RSASignature.
    SignatureValidator<SIGNATURE extends Signature>
    A SignatureValidator can validate an XDI Signature using an XDI address that identifies the signer.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractAESSignatureValidator  
    AbstractRSASignatureValidator  
    AbstractSignatureValidator<SIGNATURE extends Signature>  
    AESAgentSecretKeySignatureValidator
    This is an AESSecretKeySignatureValidator that can validate an XDI AESSignature by obtaining secret keys using an XDI agent.
    AESGraphSecretKeySignatureValidator
    This is an AESSecretKeySignatureValidator that can validate an XDI AESSignature by obtaining secret keys from a "secret key graph".
    AESSecretKeySignatureValidator
    This is an AESSignatureValidator that validate an XDI AESSignature using a secret key, which can be obtained using the XDI address that identifies the signer.
    AESStaticSecretKeySignatureValidator
    This is an AESPublicKeySignatureValidator that can validate an XDI AESSignature by obtaining secret keys from a statically configured list.
    RSAAgentPublicKeySignatureValidator
    This is an RSAPublicKeySignatureValidator that validate an XDI RSASignature by obtaining public keys using an XDI agent.
    RSADiscoveryPublicKeySignatureValidator
    This is an RSAPublicKeySignatureValidator that validate an XDI RSASignature by obtaining public keys using XDI discovery.
    RSAGraphPublicKeySignatureValidator
    This is an RSAPublicKeySignatureValidator that can validate an XDI RSASignature by obtaining public keys from a "public key graph".
    RSAPublicKeySignatureValidator
    This is an RSASignatureValidator that validate an XDI RSASignature using a public key, which can be obtained using the XDI address that identifies the signer.
    RSAStaticPublicKeySignatureValidator
    This is an RSAPublicKeySignatureValidator that can validate an XDI RSASignature by obtaining public keys from a statically configured list.
